release.note: Preparing for public release of source code. Making the VS project work without dependencies, adding docs, etc
Toolbar button is now always enabled
Color picker now has a 'Clarion code' entry control which you can use for copy paste of clarion BGR format hex codes.
Color picker now remembers the last selected color.
Returned values are converted to clarion equates where available. This includes system color equates.
If there is no active editor window found a dialog will offering to copy the selected color to the clipboard.
Experimental new addition, the color picker is now available from a Pad. See :menuselection:`View --> Tools --> Insert Clarion Color`
Detection of active text editor now works for clarion window definition editor and is generally improved for other areas.
Color lists are now docked inside their container correctly
Now has ClarionAddins global addin dependency.
